attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Advertising is cultural pollution: it generates dissatisfaction and disillusionment with life by promoting unattainable ideals (e.g in terms of appearance, lifestyle etc.) and unsustainable consumption. We call upon the Prime Minister to consider Advertising as a social threat (in the same way as Carbon Emissions are treated as an environmental threat) by introducing a scalable advertising tax payable by companies with turnover of greater than £1m.
